content.rendered:
Python is a programming language that lets you work quickly and integrate systems more effectively.Python can be used on a server to create web applications. Vmaxinfo Instituteis only institute which give perfect training in Python at basic and advanced level.

Following topics are covered in Python:

Python Basics

  • Introduction & Basic
  • Variable
  • Operators
  • String
  • List
  • Tuples
  • Sets
  • Arrays
  • Control Statements
  • Libraries & Functions
  • Exception Handling
  • Decorators
  • *args& **kwargs
  • Comprehension
  • Enumerate  function

Python Advance

  • Object Oriented Concepts
  • Excel Sheet handling
  • Numpy libraries
  • Database Access (MySQL, SQLite3)
  • Socket programming
  • Multithreading
  • GUI Programming  (tkinter)
  • Project’s
  • Basic of Machine Learning Concepts
  • Basic of Data Analysis
  • How Pandas work ?
